plot: After being bedridden with a spinal cord injury, I was kindly reminded how important friendships are. This inspirational video consists of the giving people who helped and were asked "What does friendship mean to you?"
title: #friendsthemovie
plot_es: After being bedridden with a spinal cord injury, I was kindly reminded how important friendships are. This inspirational video consists of the giving people who helped and were asked "What does friendship mean to you?"
